item.title: Viral BTS video shows Varun Dhawan continuing intimate scene with Nargis Fakhri even after director yells - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Viral BTS Video of Varun Dhawan and Nargis Fakhri Captures Hilarious On-set Moment

Publication Date: Recent | Source: Times of India

A behind-the-scenes video featuring Bollywood stars Varun Dhawan and Nargis Fakhri has gone viral, showing a comedic moment during the filming of the 2014 movie 'Main Tera Hero'.

  • The clip features Varun Dhawan continuing an intimate scene after the director calls "Cut... Cut... Cut!".
  • The situation results in laughter from Nargis and the crew, showcasing their on-set chemistry.
  • The video has garnered over 100K views and has sparked discussions about actors' boundaries during filming.
  • Nargis Fakhri described Varun as her 'favourite co-star' and praised his energy and humor.
  • Varun Dhawan's recent works include the film 'Baby John' and the web series 'Citadel: Honey Bunny.'
Nargis Fakhri: "I think I had the most fun with Varun Dhawan on set. He's just really full of energy and positivity and he's funny, so it's contagious."

The video has stirred a mix of reactions from fans, highlighting both criticism and admiration for the actors' playful interactions.

item.title: Daaku Maharaaj Box Office Collections: Second biggest opening for a NBK film - PINKVILLA
item.description:
Daaku Maharaaj Box Office Collections: Second biggest opening for a NBK film

Updated on Jan 13, 2025 | Source: Pinkvilla

Daaku Maharaaj recorded the second-biggest opening for an NBK starrer at the Indian box office, amassing approximately Rs. 26 crore. Despite an unconventional Sunday release, the film performed strongly, particularly in Andhra Pradesh.

  • The film grossed Rs. 23 crore in the Telugu states.
  • Had potential to surpass Rs. 30.25 crore if released solo.
  • Strong reception from audiences during the Sankranti period.
  • The film has good prospects ahead due to the rejection of competitors.
  • Opened well overseas with nearly USD 1 million on opening day in the United States.

The First Day Box Office Collections of Daaku Maharaaj are as follows:

Area Gross
AP/TS Rs. 23.00 cr.
Nizam Rs. 6.50 cr.
Ceded Rs. 5.25 cr.
Andhra Rs. 11.25 cr.
Karnataka Rs. 2.50 cr.
Tamil Nadu Rs. 0.25 cr.
Rest of India Rs. 0.25 cr.
INDIA Rs. 26.00 cr.
“The initial reception seems to be decent enough.”

In conclusion, Daaku Maharaaj's impressive opening indicates strong audience interest and highlights its potential for further financial success during the lucrative Sankranti period.

item.title: Ben Affleck emotionally hugs and kisses daughter Violet's forehead after fleeing Palisades fire - Hindustan Times
item.description:
As wildfires threaten Hollywood, Ben Affleck shares a touching embrace with his daughter, Violet, after a harrowing evacuation from his LA mansion.

Date: Jan 13, 2025

Source: Hindustan Times

Amid the terrifying backdrop of the Palisades Fire, actor Ben Affleck was photographed sharing a tender moment with his eldest daughter, Violet. After a hasty evacuation, Affleck was seen embracing his daughter in a warm, emotional hug, expressing relief as he returned to find his property unharmed.

  • Ben Affleck and daughter Violet had an emotional reunion after escaping the wildfires threatening their home.
  • The Palisades Fire has already claimed 16 lives and forced mass evacuations of several celebrity homes.
  • Affleck's property was spared from the devastation, and he expressed gratitude for his family's safety.
  • He has maintained regular contact with ex-wife Jennifer Lopez during the crisis.
  • Violet is preparing to return to Yale University for the spring semester.
“Ben’s home is still under evacuation order, but he feels so grateful his property is safe for the time being,” a source said.

The touching moment between Affleck and Violet highlights the personal toll of the wildfires, reminding us of the importance of family amidst crisis.

item.title: Fateh box office collection day 3: Sonu Sood, Jacqueline Fernandez film earns just over ₹6 crore so far - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Fateh Box Office Collection Day 3: The Film Struggles to Gain Momentum in India

Date: Jan 13, 2025 | Source: Hindustan Times

The Indian box office collection for Sonu Sood's directorial debut, Fateh, remains low after three days. The film garnered just over ₹6 crore in total earnings as it faces competition from other significant releases.

  • Day 1 earnings: ₹2.4 crore
  • Day 2 earnings: ₹2.1 crore
  • Day 3 earnings (early estimates): ₹2.1 crore
“Whenever a Bollywood movie is made, we often say that why our movies do not have action scenes like foreign movies,” said Sonu Sood.

The film is inspired by real-life incidents of cybercrime during the Covid-19 pandemic and features prominent actors like Jacqueline Fernandez and Naseeruddin Shah.

item.title: Sankranthiki Vasthunnam : OTT and satellite partners revealed - 123telugu
item.description:
Sankranthiki Vasthunnam: OTT and Satellite Partners Revealed

Published on Jan 13, 2025 11:00 am IST

Victory Venkatesh and director Anil Ravipudi are reuniting for their third collaboration in Sankranthiki Vasthunnam, an action comedy set to release globally tomorrow. The film stars Meenakshi Choudhary and Aishwarya Rajesh.

  • The OTT and satellite rights have been secured by the Zee group.
  • The movie will stream on ZEE5 and air on ZEE Telugu and ZEE Cinemalu channels.
  • Details regarding the premiere will be announced soon.
  • A stellar supporting cast includes Naresh, Upendra Limaye, VTV Ganesh, Sai Kumar, and Srinivas Avasarala.
  • The film is produced by Dil Raju, with music composed by Bheems Ceciroleo.
This festive release is set to entertain audiences with its energetic music and engaging performances.

Overall, Sankranthiki Vasthunnam is expected to be a highlight this festival season, appealing to a broad audience.

item.title: Shraddha Kapoor's wallpaper is of her boyfriend Rahul Mody, eagle eyed fans are quick to notice as they g - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Shraddha Kapoor's wallpaper is of her boyfriend Rahul Mody, eagle eyed fans are quick to notice as they get elated and say 'my girl is happy y'all' - PIC inside

Publication Date: January 11, 2023 | Source: Times of India

Shraddha Kapoor and Rahul Mody are rumored to be in a relationship, though Shraddha has not publicly confirmed it. Recently, eagle-eyed fans spotted her phone wallpaper featuring Rahul, which sparked excitement online.

  • Shraddha has previously teased her relationship with Rahul Mody on social media.
  • Fans reacted positively upon discovering the wallpaper, celebrating Shraddha's happiness.
  • Rahul Mody was involved in the production of Shraddha's recent film.
  • In an interview, Shraddha spoke affectionately about her partner without naming him.
“I really love spending time with my partner and doing things with him like watching a movie, going for dinner, or travelling.”

The discovery of the wallpaper has generated a buzz among fans, showcasing their enthusiasm for Shraddha's personal life.

item.title: Game Changer Box Office Collections: Ram Charan and Shankar film scores a mere 125cr weekend worldwide - PINKVILLA
item.description:
Game Changer Box Office Collections: Ram Charan and Shankar film scores a mere 125cr weekend worldwide

Publication Date: January 13, 2025 | Source: Pinkvilla

The film Game Changer has witnessed a dramatic decline in box office collections, grossing a total of Rs. 125 crore during its opening weekend worldwide.

  • The film's collections dropped significantly, adding only Rs. 17.50 crore on Sunday.
  • In India, the total collection stands at Rs. 99.75 crore.
  • Overseas, it grossed approximately USD 2.90 million.
  • In Telugu states, it earned only Rs. 6.50 crore on its worst Sunday in recent years.
  • The expected closing collection is between Rs. 75-80 crore in Telugu states.

The Box Office Collections of Game Changer:

Area Gross
AP/TS Rs. 60.50 cr.
Nizam Rs. 20.50 cr.
Ceded Rs. 11.25 cr.
Andhra Rs. 28.75 cr.
Karnataka Rs. 7.25 cr.
Tamil Nadu Rs. 5.50 cr.
Kerala Rs. 0.50 cr.
Rest of India Rs. 26.00 cr.
OVERSEAS USD 2,930,000 (Rs. 25.00 cr.)
WORLDWIDE Rs. 124.75 cr.
It is essentially “game over” for Game Changer as collections have plummeted to alarmingly low levels.

In conclusion, despite expectations during the Sankranti holidays, the film is unlikely to recover and face significant financial losses.

item.title: Ajith Kumar’s Dubai 24H 2025 win gets praise from Samantha Ruth Prabhu, Rajinikanth: ‘What an example’ - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Ajith Kumar’s Dubai 24H 2025 win gets praise from Samantha Ruth Prabhu, Rajinikanth: ‘What an example’

Date: Jan 13, 2025 Source: Hindustan Times

Ajith Kumar made headlines by securing third place in the 24H Dubai 2025 endurance race despite facing an accident shortly before the event. He received congratulatory messages from prominent actors including Samantha Ruth Prabhu and Rajinikanth.

  • Ajith secured third place in the competition despite a recent accident.
  • Samantha Ruth Prabhu praised Ajith's determination on social media.
  • Rajinikanth sent good wishes on Twitter, highlighting Ajith's achievement.
  • The victory included accolades for 'Spirit of the race' in the gt4 category.
  • An emotional celebration was shared on social media, showcasing Ajith waving the Indian flag.
“What an example of never becoming complacent with your accomplishments and continuously pushing yourself to work harder, @ajithkumarracing.” - Samantha Ruth Prabhu

This achievement marks a significant milestone in Ajith's racing career and a proud moment for Indian motorsports.

item.title: Nagabandham: Rana unveils Virat Karrna’s rugged first look poster - 123telugu
item.description:
Nagabandham: Rana unveils Virat Karrna’s rugged first look poster

Published on: Jan 13, 2025 10:32 am IST

After the success of Devil, director Abhishek Nama presents his latest project, Nagabandham – The Secret Treasure, starring Virat Karrna. The film's first look poster showcases a rugged Karrna battling a crocodile in a striking pose.

  • Virat Karrna stars in a mythological adventure exploring ancient Vishnu temples.
  • Co-starring Nabha Natesh and Iswarya Menon.
  • Music is composed by Abhe.
  • The film draws inspiration from the Padmanabhaswamy and Puri Jagannath temples.
  • Set to release later this year.
“The film promises an epic, modern take on timeless mysteries surrounding India's ancient rituals.”

Nagabandham is generating significant interest ahead of its release, aiming to blend mythological themes with engaging narratives.

item.description:

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Latest Telugu Movie Videos

This article presents a poll asking viewers to choose between two films, 'Game Changer' and 'Daaku Maharaaj', regarding which film entertained them the most.

The purpose of this poll is to gauge audience preferences between two popular films.

item.title: Wamiqa Gabbi Hits Back At Influencer Slamming Her Alleged 'PR Strategy': 'Hum Aah Bhi Karte Hai Toh...' - News18
item.description:
Wamiqa Gabbi Hits Back At Influencer Slamming Her Alleged 'PR Strategy': 'Hum Aah Bhi Karte Hai Toh...'

Publication Date: January 13, 2025, Source: News18

Wamiqa Gabbi recently responded to social media influencer Nadeesh Bhambi after he criticized her alleged PR strategy. This prompted discussions around her popularity and talent.

  • Wamiqa defended herself against comments made by Nadeesh Bhambi in a viral video.
  • She highlighted the comments praising her beauty and talent while countering negativity regarding her PR strategy.
  • The conversation escalated, including a reference to a couplet by Akbar Allahabadi underscoring her feelings on public perception.
  • Wamiqa gained acclaim for her recent role in the series Jubilee, showcasing the challenges of the film industry.
“Hum aah bhi karte hain toh ho jaate hain badnaam, vo qatl bhi karte hain to charcha nahin hota.” - Wamiqa Gabbi

In conclusion, Wamiqa's confident response reflects her resilience in the face of criticism and highlights her achievements in the entertainment industry.

item.title: Game Changer Worldwide Box Office Collection Day 3: Ram Charan-Shankar film sees a massive 65 percent drop, inches towards the Rs 100 cr club - The Indian Express
item.description:
Game Changer Worldwide Box Office Collection Day 3

Date & Source: January 13, 2025, Indian Express

Game Changer, starring Ram Charan and directed by Shankar, opened to significant anticipation but has seen a major decline in box office collections over its first weekend.

  • The film earned Rs 51 crore on its opening day but only Rs 21.6 crore on Day 2.
  • Day 3 saw a further drop to Rs 17 crore, bringing the total domestic nett collection to Rs 89.6 crore.
  • The dip is attributed to mixed reviews and competition from another film, Daaku Maharaaj.
  • Despite the slump, the global box office estimate for the opening weekend is projected to be between Rs 250-300 crore.
  • Hindi language collections have remained stable, unlike the Telugu version which has faced a stark decline.
“The biggest dips in the collections came from the Telugu version of the film.”

The future performance of Game Changer remains uncertain as it competes with new releases during the holiday season.

item.title: Los Angeles wildfires: Former child actor Rory Sykes tragically dies in Malibu after water was switched off - The Indian Express
item.description:
Tragic Death of Former Child Actor Rory Sykes Amid Malibu Wildfires

Date: January 13, 2025
Source: Indian Express

Rory Callum Sykes, a former child star known for the British TV show Kiddy Kapers, died at 32 during the devastating wildfires in Los Angeles.

  • Rory had cerebral palsy and was blind, making evacuation impossible.
  • His mother confirmed his death, stating he died from carbon monoxide poisoning.
  • Firefighters faced water shortages due to lack of municipal water supply.
  • The wildfires have resulted in at least 24 confirmed deaths so far.
  • The Palisades fire has destroyed over 22,000 acres and is only partially contained.
“It is with great sadness that I have to announce the death of my beautiful son @Rorysykes to the Malibu fires yesterday. I’m totally heart broken.” – Shelley Sykes

The tragic incident highlights the human cost of the wildfires and raises concerns over emergency response efficiency.

item.description:
Wamiqa Gabbi claps back at influencer for questioning her PR game after videos comparing her to Aishwarya Rai emerge

Date: Jan 13, 2025 | Source: Hindustan Times

Wamiqa Gabbi recently reacted to social media influencer Nadeesh Bhambi after he criticized her PR strategies through a video that compared her to Aishwarya Rai. The exchange showcased sarcasm and humor from both sides.

  • Wamiqa Gabbi criticized Nadeesh's comments regarding her PR strategy.
  • Nadeesh's video made humorous comparisons, including comments about Wamiqa’s appearance.
  • Wamiqa sarcastically responded about her PR attempts to run for president.
  • The conversation transitioned into Hindi shayari exchanges.
  • Wamiqa starred in the film "Baby John", which struggled at the box office.
“Talented aur Khoobsurat bhi? Uff, Thaaaank you.” - Wamiqa Gabbi

In conclusion, the humorous spat between Wamiqa and Nadeesh highlights the strange yet entertaining world of social media interactions in celebrity culture.

item.description:
Bigg Boss 18 Top 5 Finalists Name: Who Will Be Eliminated After BB 18 Press Conference?

Updated: Monday, January 13, 2025

This weekend marks the exciting finale of Bigg Boss season 18, which has captivated audiences for over three months.

  • The grand finale is set for January 19, 2025.
  • Top 5 finalists will compete for the winner's trophy, with the possibility of a top 6.
  • Bigg Boss 18 will be replaced by Laughter Chefs season 2 from January 25.
  • Chahat Pandey was recently evicted after receiving low votes, stirring controversy among fans.
  • Predictions suggest Eisha Singh and Shilpa Shirodkar are likely to be the next eliminated contestants.
“Chahat Pandey's elimination set several tongues wagging as the fans accused the channel of 'nepotism', stating that the actress deserved to stay in the game.”

The season's conclusion promises to be action-packed with expectations of dramatic twists leading up to the finale.

item.title: 'Pushpa 2' box office collection Day 38: Allu Arjun and Rashmika Mandana’s mass entertainer continues to - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Pushpa 2 box office collection Day 38: Allu Arjun and Rashmika Mandana’s mass entertainer continues to shine on its 6th Saturday with the business of Rs 2 crore

Date: October 2023 Source: Times of India

Despite being 38 days into its release, 'Pushpa 2' achieved a remarkable Rs 2 crore at the box office, showcasing its enduring popularity among audiences.

  • 'Pushpa 2' remains a mass entertainer, drawing in audiences.
  • On its 6th Saturday, the film grossed Rs 2 crore.
  • The film stars Allu Arjun and Rashmika Mandana.
  • Positive audience reception contributes to its sustained performance.
The film continues to set box office records well into its sixth week.

This box office performance highlights the film's appeal and the strong fan base of its leading actors, promising continued success in the weeks to come.

item.title: Abhishek Bachchan makes a brief appearance as Amitabh Bachchan meets fans outside Jalsa, watches father from balcony - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Abhishek Bachchan makes a brief appearance as Amitabh Bachchan meets fans outside Jalsa

Date: Jan 13, 2025 Source: Hindustan Times

Amitabh Bachchan continued his Sunday tradition of meeting fans outside his residence, Jalsa, where his son Abhishek also made a brief appearance, adding to the excitement of the day.

  • Amitabh Bachchan greeted a crowd of fans who gathered outside his home.
  • He wore traditional attire and expressed gratitude towards his supporters.
  • Abhishek was seen watching from the balcony and waved to the crowd.
  • Amitabh reflected on the love and increasing numbers of fans in a blog post after the meet.
  • Both actors are involved in upcoming film projects.
“But the Sunday meet at the gate was as always awesome .. the numbers increase I think and the love even more .. I am so blessed.” - Amitabh Bachchan

Amitabh's weekly fan interactions showcase the enduring bond he shares with his supporters, while Abhishek's presence highlights the family's connection with their audience.

item.title: Bigg Boss 18: Avinash Mishra demands an apology from Chum Darang to Vivian Dsena for ruining the Ticket T - The Times of India
item.description:
Bigg Boss 18: Avinash Mishra demands an apology from Chum Darang to Vivian Dsena for ruining the Ticket To Finale task, says 'kabhi expected nahi tha'

Publication Date: Not available Source: Not available

In a recent episode of Bigg Boss 18, contestant Avinash Mishra has publicly demanded an apology from Chum Darang directed towards Vivian Dsena, claiming that the former ruined the Ticket To Finale task. This has stirred considerable attention and discussions among fans of the show.

  • Avinash Mishra expressed his disappointment over Chum Darang's actions.
  • The ticket to the finale task was highly anticipated among contestants and viewers alike.
  • Mishra stated that he never expected such behavior from Chum, saying, 'kabhi expected nahi tha.'
“Kabhi expected nahi tha” - Avinash Mishra

With tensions rising in the house, this incident may have significant implications for contestant dynamics moving forward.

item.title: Venkatesh and Rana Daggubati booked for illegal demolition of Deccan Kitchen Hotel in Hyderabad - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Venkatesh and Rana Daggubati booked for illegal demolition of Deccan Kitchen Hotel in Hyderabad

Date: October 10, 2023 Source: Times of India

Popular actors Venkatesh and Rana Daggubati have been booked for allegedly demolishing the Deccan Kitchen Hotel in Hyderabad without proper permissions.

  • The hotel was reportedly destroyed on October 8, causing significant outrage.
  • The demolition is believed to be linked to the actors' ongoing real estate projects.
  • Local authorities are investigating the circumstances surrounding the demolition.
“No one is above the law, and we will take strict action against illegal constructions,” said an official.

The case against the actors not only highlights the legal implications of their actions but also raises questions about celebrity influence in urban development.

item.description:

Sankranthiki Vasthunnam is generating significant buzz in the lead-up to its release, with impressive ticket sales suggesting strong box office potential.

This film is poised to be an entertaining hit during the holiday season.

item.title: Game Changer box office collection Day 3: Ram Charan starrer sees collections fall under Rs 20 crore; mis - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Game Changer box office collection Day 3: Ram Charan starrer sees collections fall under Rs 20 crore; misses Rs 100 crore mark on debut weekend

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Times of India

On its third day, the film 'Game Changer' starring Ram Charan experienced a decline in box office collections, falling below Rs 20 crore, thus failing to reach the Rs 100 crore milestone in its opening weekend.

  • The film saw a significant drop in box office performance on Day 3.
  • It collected under Rs 20 crore, which is a sharp decline compared to earlier projections.
  • The total collections for the weekend fell short of Rs 100 crore.
“The film’s initial performance was promising, but it appears to have lost momentum quickly.”

This outcome raises questions about the film's long-term box office prospects and audience reception moving forward.

item.title: Horoscope Today, January 13, 2025: Check here Astrological predictions for all zodiac signs - India Today
item.description:
Daily Horoscope: Find out Astrological prediction for January 13 2025

Published On: Jan 13, 2025 | Source: India Today

Discover astrological predictions for each zodiac sign today, covering aspects of love, health, money, and career.

  • Aries: Favorable social environment; expect success in career.
  • Taurus: Family affairs favorable; new clothes and strong relationships.
  • Gemini: Inspired to think creatively; improved standard of living.
  • Cancer: Focus on practical investments; smooth interactions with relatives.
  • Leo: Strong morale; opportunities for meetings and supportive contacts.
  • Virgo: Attractive proposals; gains and growth on the rise.
  • Libra: Impressive outcomes due to good fortune; systematic progress.
  • Scorpio: Proceed with caution; family support available.
  • Sagittarius: Foster partnerships; enjoy pleasant moments with loved ones.
  • Capricorn: Maintain diligence; job-seeking efforts strengthened.
  • Aquarius: Move forward with confidence; success through intelligence.
  • Pisces: Focus on harmony with family; favorable work conditions.

“You will remain active in social fields and make an impact in commerce and trade.”

“Work with intelligence and caution, avoiding risky ventures.”

Overall, astrological predictions suggest a day full of opportunities for growth and positive relationships across all zodiac signs.

item.title: Inventing Anna actor Julia Garner interview: ‘Nothing’s ever really easy if you want it to be good' - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Julia Garner Discusses Her Role in Wolf Man and the Challenges of Horror Films

Publication Date: N/A Source: Hindustan Times

In an interview with Hindustan Times, Julia Garner opens up about her transition from the hit Netflix series Inventing Anna to starring in the upcoming film Wolf Man, highlighting the unique experiences and challenges of horror filmmaking.

  • Garner reflects on her journey from playing a scam artist to starring in a traditional monster movie.
  • She describes Wolf Man as a film meant for the big screen, emphasizing the cinematic experience.
  • Garner's character, Charlotte, experiences emotional complexity as her husband transforms into a werewolf.
  • The preparation involved interviewing working mothers to portray Charlotte's struggles authentically.
  • Garner mentions the physical demands of the role, stating that it involved significantly more running than any previous projects.
“Nothing's ever really easy if you want it to be good. Usually, the simplest things are the hardest.” – Julia Garner

The film Wolf Man is not just a horror movie; it serves as a narrative about relationships, loss, and the fight for survival against overwhelming odds.
